name: Sweet Jenkins
text: It was my & husband first time to eat there let me tell you. It was the "BEST" ever YES we will be going back we both truly loved ❤ the food. The Food, & Service was EXCELLENT & my husband left an $20.00 tip the services was just that good. And anybody know my husband knows that he don't do big tips like that⭕‼️‼️‼️.

name: TM
text: Had a great time at the Mushroom! The food was good, but my pizza was left in the oven maybe just a couple of minutes too long, as the crust had begun to burn. …More

name: Jessi Scott
text: One of the best pizza joints in LR.  Ordered online and it was ready in 20 minutes. I love being able to pull up curbside and having it brought out. Especially in covid times.  Try the Buffalo chicken! Super good.

name: yogi steph
text: This was my first time and I was so WOWWWWWED!!! I would paybjust to sit in this place and look around. It is so clean too which is so important right now. The food and service is awesome and the prices are about the same you pay at other places. Definitely check this place out.

name: Toney Green
text: We went to Mellow Mushroom on Saturday around 7pm.  It wasn't crowded at all.  I ordered the meat ball appetizer along with six pretzels that had three dipping sauces; beer cheese, marinara and mustard.  I also ordered a small bowl of …More

name: Dylan Anderson
text: We love Mellow Mushroom! It is one of the only places that we can get quality gluten free pizza from. We were with a group and tried 4 different pizzas, one of which was gluten free. All of the pizzas we had were great!

name: Ash Dominguez
text: I went in with 3 girlfriends, my niece, my brother and our server was Natile. She was AMAZING! Her energy is awesome. So funny and personal.

name: Warren
text: Delicious vegan pizza with tofu and vegan cheese. They were busy so the order took 30 minutes+ but delicious food was had.

name: John Ball
text: The pizza was pretty good. Had their version of the meat lovers. Only real complaint was the bottom of the pizza was slightly burnt. Not charred just too over done. Still was a good visit over all. The customer service was great. Keep it up.

name: Daniela R
text: Excellent spot for tasty Pizza. visited fri evening i think. i'll return with my relatives. this place has a good feel to it. mood here reminds me of san diego's scene.

name: Brittney Thomas
text: Funny waiters and waitress, great food, and alcohol. This is one of the best pizza spots in Little Rock!

name: Rachel Pugh
text: Service was great and timely!! Drinks were delicious

name: Gregory Snell
text: Pizza is always great. I enjoy the buffalo chicken. They also have great salads.

name: M. K.
text: The first trick is finding someone to seat you and take your order. After that, the food is delicious...if it's actually cooked right. Basically going here is a gamble; it's either great or terrible depending on who's working, no in-between. I've had 2/5 good experiences here, so we'll go with 2/5 stars.

name: Denice Taylor
text: Great atmosphere. Very attentive wait staff. Food is pretty good too. Games available for the kids to play.

name: Brook Harman
text: Excellence in pizza. Funky fun casual atmosphere. You must try the pretzel bites with beer cheese sauce. You won't be disappointed.

name: Matt Buie
text: Our Rotary BREW Fellowship met at Mellow Mushoom for drinks, bites, and "real" social networking.  Our club members received great service and everyone tells me they really enjoyed the visit.  I heard positive remarks on the bites shared …More

name: Luke Hightower
text: Mellow Mushroom has a cool atmosphere,  great food, and swesome staff. The main seating room has recently reopened at 50% capacity and the staff is very diligent about safety and social distance.

name: Will Allen
text: enjoyed the pizza and service was good just took over 30 minutes to get our food

name: Chris Daigle
text: Very tasty pizza. We had a coupon and wanted to try out their pizza. We decided on the Pacific Rim with a thin crust. I enjoyed as much as my wife, but I pulled the jalapenos off! Coke Zero made a great taste along with it. Our waitress was …More

name: Rebecca Me
text:
The food here is fantastic BUT they have messed up my order three times.
I ordered extra cheese and you can see through the cheese to almost the entire pizza.  When i asked about it i was told this is extra cheese.

name: Grace
text: I went to the restaurant on a Sunday afternoon around 2. The atmosphere inside the restaurant is fantastic. Servers and hosts were extremely cheery. However, at times they spent more time socializing than checking on their tables. After …More

name: Myka S
text: We got seated, waited 10 minutes before they came and asked what we wanted to drink and for appetizer, took 10 minutes to get the drinks to us, then another for appetizer, when we got out appetizer they didnt give us plates,silverware, or …More

name: Wesley White
text: My level of frustration regarding the order that I just placed at mellow mushroom is through the roof I called at 6:15 to modify an order. And ask that it be cooked a little sooner than the only order time. …More

name: Brittany Pringle
text: Great service by Krystal. Loved that they accommodated my silly request for them to write something on the pizza in their delicious balsamic glaze.

name: Jared Butler
text: Good food but slow service considering there were just a few tables occupied in the restaurant

name: Wayne Liddy
text: I  assume the place just opened back up but the service was not good at all, Tori, our server seemed lost.  Drinks very very slow to come out.  Cheese Bread was good and the pizza was mediocre at best.  The pizza was like warm and didn't …More

name: blitzfire
text: Some of the best spinach and artichoke dip I've ever had.  Tried the house special pizza, as well as the Buffalo chicken pizza. Both were excellent (the strips of bacon and the honey ham on the special were very nice touches).  Carla was awesome, too.  Attentive, quick, and friendly.  Will return.

name: Kandice Martin
text: The food was great and the service was ok. I would go back again

name: Cristi Carper
text: I have Celiac and and have to eat GLUTEN FREE! The options here are awesome and the pizzas (GLUTEN FREE) are AMAZING!!! Definitely recommend!

name: Shereé Someone
text: Great service, awesome bartender!! One of my favorite pizza places, hands down!

name: Kristofer D
text: Two visits in a row we had sub-par service, and as you can see by the picture, food as well. Both times we had to wait an unacceptable amount of time for our food. The first trip at least, you could tell the server was working hard to check …More

name: Eduardo Hunter
text: We came to this restaurant for a meeting. This spot was recommended to us by a friend.  Well, it was very successful. The staff members welcomed us with a smile and we felt excellent. The food was just great. We had a great time and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Keep it up.

name: Brian Locke
text: I like this place.   A lot of people like this place.   I have been here several times, there are always birthday parties going on here.   The food is quite good.   The prices are quite good.   The service is great.   I am one to appreciate …More

name: Shawn Schouweiler
text: The pizza had plenty of toppings. The staff was attentive & polite.

name: Bryce D
text: This was my first suburbia Mellow Mushroom, and the quality of food lived up to the name. If you’re familiar with Mellows, this particular one has been strip center adapted and has no real charm that one would expect from the brand. The …More

name: Brooklynn Roark
text: I showed up at 11:45 pm so have a beer and some pizza and the restaurant was pitch black completely dark. I checked online before coming and it said that it was open until 1 am on Saturday night. It wasn’t the was dark even on door it said …More

name: Renee Mckinney
text: The place was clean enough. When the server came to our table she had animal hair on her shirt, hair looked greasy and most disgusting of all her hands and her nails. There was so much filth under her nails we had to leave. How is this …More

name: Virginia Porta
text: Sunday evening.  7 tables with guests.   Had to stop a server to ask to be seated(no one watching the front).    Asked for a draft beer and appetizer.  Beer was out.  Asked what else was out - waitress wasn’t sure.   Ordered another beer. …More

name: Adam Savage
text: Went there for a late lunch with my wife.  We both got lunch specials; she's got a small pepperoni pizza and a small house salad; I got the Italian hoagie with chips.  The pizza was fresh and tasty but not very different than any other …More

name: Spicey Fajita
text: Carissa Bartendar was super friendly n amazing!!! We visited on Sunday

name: Kris Lehner
text: Soild win with the new management! Good place to watch the games.

name: Steve Dixon
text: First time to eat here every thing was great good food great service will be back 👍👌

name: Lizzie Harness
text: Yummy food. Gluten free options. Clean. Nice servers. Highly recommend.

name: E Leet
text: So, there are NO signs saying they are closed but no one is here. Their temporary hours even say 11a-8pm.  I drove an hour to get here and nothing. I am very upset.

name: Jay Douglass
text: Walked in, sign said "Please wait to be seated." No one came so I sat down myself. Sat at a table for a few minutes while the entire wait staff made eye contact with me without saying anything. I left a few minutes later. They weren't even busy.

name: Stephanie Fowler
text: So good and the service is friendly!

name: Liz Corbett
text: The service is always great, there is a ton of beers on tap,  and the pizza is amazing. They use top of the line ingredients which makes the pizza so tasty. You just have to try it!

name: Akio of Lud
text: Partly my fault, came in an hour and a half before close, yet the veg pizza was fairly skimpy on the veggies. Each slice for the price was basically equivalent to Pizza Hut (which outside of Little Caesars is my least favorite). It was …More

name: Lashondra Watson
text: I love eating here! I'm vegan and there aren't too many places in Little Rock that I can get a vegan pizza. MM is one of them and the pizza is always amazing. The servers are always so helpful. Each time that I go, I try a different alcoholic beverage and even those have been wonderful. MM is hands-down my favorite pizza joint!

name: Natural State Adventures
text: Went in for lunch and had a great experience, the staff were excellent and so was the food. Our pizza was slightly over cooked but not bad at all and the server had another one made and sent us home with it at no extra charge! We will be going back.

name: Soundwave144 rules
text:
Nice laid back place, menu is big and customization is unlimited. All in all great food except I ordered the brownie for desert and it was good but still frozen in the middle but they removed it from my bill without me asking them to.
Ill go back!

name: Giordana Brami
text: Wrong hours, called in to check and when I arrived they closed earlier. Shameful

name: Nicholas Baker
text: Very very good selection of craft beer and a few cocktails. Everything on the menu from appetizers to pizza to sandwiches are delicious and filling. Pizza is delicious if a bit pricey compared to other pizza joints. Service is always very …More

name: Terrence Boatwright
text: The food was good! The service was pretty good! The kitchen getting the food out was horrible it was very very slow but the food was good.

name: By C
text:
Plenty of parking, easy to get to... Food is excellent, prices are average..  Wife had a calzone, I had a sub, pizzas looked good and smelled very good...
Your taste buds will thank you 👍

name: Tara Williams
text: Love this place.   Great food and great prices

name: Veronica D.
text:
I loved the ceasar salad pizza, came with a Greek sauce, my kids ordered a half cheese half pep, it was delicious!
We did have to wait a while but it tasted fresh and the cheese was fantastic!

name: Mary K Ausbrooks
text: Melina is the best! Food was great! Can’t wait to come back!!

name: myleftfootoffury
text: Pricey for pizza, but totally worth it. Really like the decor, and the food is excellent!

text: My husband and I love this place. Great pizza with fresh toppings. The spinach and artichoke dip is to die for!

name: Teresa Carr
text: Atmosphere is great but for the price you pay you'd think they'd out more toppings on the pizza? Had easily 3 inches of crust. It tasted great but it was basically glorified garlic bread

name: Dee Elkins
text: Neat place. Haven't the pizza yet, we are watching the Razorback game in the bar while we wait. And we got free soda while the wait time was rather long.

text: Amazing crew, great drinks. Wings were amazing but the pizza is where its at. Loved the concept of building my own bloody Mary also. I'll defanetly be back

text: Bruschetta is good. Pizza crust good. Sandwich bread (baguette) was too crusty and sharp for a sandwich. Went with a large party and service was fine.

name: Ashley M.

name: Christopher Hall
text: Pizza was good, ordered the Mighty Meaty and a pepperoni. Ingredients tasted fresh. Service was painfully slow. We arrived around 6:45PM and were seated as soon as we entered the restaurant. After we were seated it took about 15 minutes for …More

name: Enid Valentine
text: Always great service and great pizza!!

name: Carol Ray
text: We love Mellow Mushroom! The pizza is always fresh. However, this last visit took over an hour to get one medium pizza and half sandwich. Our waitress Natile was super sweet and friendly.

name: Erik Nugent
text: The best pizza in all of Arkansas! When we 1st moved to Little Rock we ordered pizza from the closest restaurant and it was disappointing. Then we went to the next closest restaurant and it was worse. Then we went to the next restaurant and …More

name: John Hetfield
text: Great music, great food.

name: justin tolin
text: Witnessed a customer act terribly inappropriately towards a young child.  The manager and her staff handled it as well as anyone could.  On top of excellent food and service for my party.  10/10 would recommend

name: DDBBVV 4125

name: Michael Ratican

name: Kelly Goldberg

text: It's ok. Nothing to really brag about.

name: wendy coulter

Great service...

text: This food his horrible--no seasoning, undercooked, and bad customer service. Don't go here. A frozen store bought pizza tastes much better than this.

text: We had a nice time and the food was great. The service was a little slower than usual for a Mellow Mushroom, but by no means bad. We will definitely be back and probably make this a 5 start then.

name: Lowana Hudson
text: Excellent as always.  My only complaint is that i purchased a sweet deal coupon and they make you use the whole $50 at once.  There are only 2 of us so we have to order a bunch of food that we won't eat in order not to lose the extra dollars.

text: Definitely one of the best pizzas I’ve ever had! Divine slices!

text: Ordered a pizza to go, a mighty meat and pesto cheese bread Went to pick it up 30 minutes later... went to the pick up area, was told to go to the bar. Went to the bar, paid and waited. Bartender was rude was ignored for another 45 minutes …More

name: VJ Allman
text: My favorite pizza place. Burgers are good too. Best spinach artichoke dip anywhere. Frankly, I haven't had anything there I didn't like. Desserts are wonderful. Ask for a beer flight if you want to try several. Local and not do local beers, ales and ciders on tap.

name: Tommy
text: Some friends and I were in there a couple of months ago for lunch. We all ordered calzones. The food was really good and the wait time was reasonable but the service was horrible. The place was not busy. The waiter Checked on us one time …More

name: Max Long
text: Great service! Pretzels and brochette are delicious!

name: Tiffany Johnson
text: When I first pulled up I saw the friendly mushroom man statue and was so thrilled to have finally found a restaurant my kids would enjoy as much as me. We took a picture with the statue and then went inside and ordered a large cheese pizza …More

name: Steven Dobbins
text: Great pizza, great service. Lots of beers on tap.

name: Tim Richardson
text: Service was a bit slow, but the staff was pleasant. The pizza was fantastic! If the quality of food is your only concern, this place is worth it!

text: Out of towners ! We drove 30+ minutes from camp Robinson to eat here on a Monday because google stated it was open. When we finally get there, they are closed.. for cleaning. I’m sorry, but why wasn’t this put on google ?? Or their website?

text: I've only been to Mellow Mushroom once before and was disappointed. This time, though, the pizza was excellent. Will definitely go again.

text: Great pizza, great atmosphere!  Some advice though- don't come here if you're really hungry because it has consistently taken 30+ minutes for the pizza to arrive.  If you are hungry and have the time, order an appetizer, sip your favorite beer, and enjoy the wait with your party.

name: Shelby Hunter
text: Was attempting a second visit with our kids. We had a great experience on out date night. Lunch time today, got seated, waited 13 minutes just sitting at our table.  Got "looked" at but never got order anything, not even drinks. Walked out before frustration went any further!
